author: Tv On February
title: WATCH: Lady Gaga s Super Bowl Performance - Yahoo7
text:
Share WATCH: Lady Gaga s Super Bowl Performance - Yahoo7 
Lady Gaga headlined the halftime show at today’s 51st Super Bowl between the Patriots and Falcons, and it's fair to say she absolutely killed her performance! Close Lady Gaga's Epic Super Bowl Performance UP NEXT VIDEO 
The singer kicked things off on the roof of the stadium before flying down onto the stage, dressed in a silver bodysuit. 
She blasted through a medley of her biggest hits, including Poker Face, Born This Way, Million Reasons, Just Dance and Bad Romance. 
Speaking to Billboard, Emma Quigley, Pepsi's North American head of music, described Gaga's halftime show as being 'uniquely Lady Gaga' -- and she definitely nailed that brief, ending her concert spectacular with an epic mic drop. Lady Gaga is a pop star.Lady Gaga is an icon.Lady Gaga is a true talent. — Alex Goldschmidt (@alexandergold) February 6, 2017 Gaga was dope. Forgot how many of her songs I liked. #SuperBowl — Philip DeFranco (@PhillyD) February 6, 2017 Lady Gaga covered more ground on the field than the Patriots. #SuperBowl — Bryan Cranston (@BryanCranston) February 6, 2017
